sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The dovvnefall of Shebna together with an application to the bloudie Gowrie of Scotland. As it was deliuered in two seuerall sermons of that occasion, in S. Maries Church in Oxford. And now published for a warning to all ill-affected Ogiluiests: vt quorum exitus perhorrescunt, eorum facta non imitentur. By I.S. Singleton, Isaac, b. 1582 or 3.
[4], 42, [2] p.
Printed [at Eliot's Court Press] for Iohn Bill, London : 1615.
Dedication signed: Isaac Singleton. Identification of printer from STC. The last leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

[4], 42, [2] p.
Printed [at Eliot's Court Press] for Iohn Bill, London : 1615.
